text: Hey guys, let's go have some fun!
speaker: Jake

text: I'm up for anything, what do you have in mind?
speaker: Rachel

text: How about we play a game of truth or dare?
speaker: Jake

text: I'm in! Truth or dare, Mike?
speaker: Rachel

text: Dare! I'm not afraid of anything!
speaker: Mike

text: Okay, I dare you to tell a joke in front of the crowd.
speaker: Rachel

text: Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the salad dressing!
speaker: Mike
